"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546869b46368724a08890200#post_546869b46368724a08890200

By staff I meant penis, but now that you bring the issue, it feels pretty awkward.

If your mixtape is not selling is due to lack of recognition, nothing gets sold unless there's a guarantee backing it up and on the internet, that's associated with the site you use.

It doesn't have to be one that requires payment, start using YouTube by posting a sample and other social network sites.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54686d8163687213fc080000#post_54686d8163687213fc080000
The movie versions certainly have a vibe that's somewhere in between western superhero and tokusatsu Superhero. 

"San fransokyo" still bugs the crap out of me. There was little to no reason not to just set it in Japan other than maybe the amount of racial diversity in the cast. Even still, they could have said the school in the movie attracts students and potential employers from all around the world.

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54686fa36368726a196c0100#post_54686fa36368726a196c0100
That's good.

The thing that's always bugged me about the comics is that they're just japanese stereotype Marvel superheroes.

If there was more to them I woudn't have an issue with it. (Like if the Samurai was a Henshin Hero Who also happens to be a Samurai rather than just a Samurai)

topics.body:
So out of absolutely nowhere a few weeks ago, a "friend" of mine mentioned  - and when I say mentioned I actually mean screamed - how absolutely "disgusting" bronies were and how they were all noxious pedophiles. If I didn't know any better, I'd think I was in a poorly scripted strawman argument, but no, there it was.

The real kicker is that she's not even a SJW, she's just an apathetic soul who bases her opinions off of what her parents hate and the internet. So I guess it's close enough.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
